This is where Liberalism, and the subsequent desire for a nanny state, fails. It is not the government's job to babysit us. We have our own liberty in this nation, at least for now, and we are to exercise it. It is indeed unfortunate that mental illness played a factor here, but unless someone reaches out for help, or a family member were to commit her for evaluation, there is not really much the city could (or should) do.

Sony is saying that technology progresses. Is there somehow who actually disagrees with that? Everyone crying tears into a pillow that their PS4v1 might no longer be the top dog of consoles should get a grip. Technology is obsolete before it even hits retailers. How do these sorts of stories yield so many nonsensical replies? The heat comments are garbage, betraying a fundamental misunderstanding of the entire field. GPUs get better. Indeed, one of the biggest improvements lately has been *huge* reductions in the power consumption, and thus heat, of GPUs.
